targets.expr: sum by(container_name, namespace_name, pod_name) (increase(logging_googleapis_com:log_entry_count{monitored_resource="k8s_container", cluster_name=~"$cluster", namespace_name=~"$namespace", severity=~"ERROR|CRITICAL", severity=~"ERROR|CRITICAL", container_name="$service", pod_name=~"$pods"}[$__interval]))

panels.title: JVM Total Memory Max, Committed, Used

targets.expr: sum by (uri, job, method) (rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", job=~"$service", uri!~"root"}[$__interval]))

panels.description:
P95 (95th Percentile): Represents the value below which 95% of the data points fall. It's commonly used to assess the performance of a system under typical load.
P99 (99th Percentile): Represents the value below which 99% of the data points fall. It helps identify outliers and potential performance issues that affect a small portion of requests.
P999 (99.9th Percentile): Represents the value below which 99.9% of the data points fall. It's used to identify extreme outliers and performance problems affecting very few requests.
panels.title: HTTP Response Percentiles

list.description: Used for linking to GCP when the project info is needed.
list.label: GCP Project
list.name: project
